title: Knight of the Living Dead
description: In this tour de farce novella, a group of Renaissance Faire performers find themselves in the middle of the Zombie Apocalypse. Can they fight their way to safety in the Arizona desert? Where exactly is Area 51? Who is the mastermind behind the Denny's franchise? Let's be honest, our heroes are some of the finest people ever to don tights... but can they piece this puzzle together and bludgeon their way through the living dead before it's too late?
author: Steve Moore
